languages.text: {n}Гемункул оскорбленно хмыкает.{/n} "Думаешь, я способен испытывать страх перед каким-то мон-кай? Он силен, но груб и туп, держать его под контролем совсем не сложно... как и любого другого представителя вашего вида".

{n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул оскорбленно хмыкает.{/n} "Думаешь, я способен испытывать страх перед каким-то мон-кай? Он силен, но груб и туп, держать его под контролем совсем не сложно... как и любого другого представителя вашего вида".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "You would dictate terms to me, specimen?" {n}The Haemonculus turns away in a fit of anger then lets out a sigh.{/n} "Then again, if I deny you, you will continue staging tiresome escape attempts, will you not? Causing no end of pointless hassle, disrupting my experiments... Then take him. More manageable that way."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}L'hémoncule pousse un grognement moqueur.{/n} « Pensez-vous vraiment qu'un vulgaire mon-keigh puisse me faire peur ? Il est puissant, mais simple d'esprit ; il me sera tout aussi facile de le maîtriser que les autres membres de votre espèce. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hémoncule pousse un grognement moqueur.{/n} « Pensez-vous vraiment qu'un vulgaire mon-keigh puisse me faire peur ? Il est puissant, mais simple d'esprit ; il me sera tout aussi facile de le maîtriser que les autres membres de votre espèce. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}血伶人发出了嘲笑的哼声。{/n}“莫非你真的以为，区区一只猴子就能吓到我吗？或许他的身体确实很强壮，但他的脑子非常简单，所以和其他猴子一样容易控制。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."

traits.locale_text: “你是打算对我发号施令吗，实验对象？”{n}血伶人愤怒地转过了身，随后发出一声叹息。{/n}“但话说回来，如果我拒绝了你，你恐怕只会继续上演令人厌倦的逃跑大戏，对吧？这只会造成没完没了的麻烦，干扰我的实验……既然这样，就带他走吧，这样我会更容易控制状况。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Denkt Ihr wirklich, ein Chem-Pan-Sey macht mir Angst? Sein Leib mag stark sein, aber sein Geist ist simpel, deshalb ist er nicht schwieriger zu kontrollieren als jedes andere Exemplar Eurer Spezies."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr möchtet mir Bedingungen diktieren, Versuchsstück?" {n}Der Haemonculus wendet sich zornig ab und stößt dann ein Seufzen aus.{/n} "Andererseits, wenn ich Euch den Wunsch abschlage, unternehmt Ihr weiterhin ermüdende Fluchtversuche, nicht wahr? Was mir endlosen unnützen Ärger macht, meine Experimente stört ... Dann nehmt ihn. Das erspart mir einiges an Mühe."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}El Hemónculo se burla.{/n} «¿Crees que puede asustarme un miserable mon-keigh? Su cuerpo es fuerte, pero su mente es simple y por lo tanto es tan fácil de controlar como el resto de vuestra especie».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pretende establecer sus propios términos, espécimen?». {n}El Hemónculo se da la vuelta en un ataque de ira y suelta un suspiro.{/n} «Pero, si se lo deniego, seguirás montando insoportables numeritos de escape, ¿verdad? Y causando un sinfín de problemas sin sentido, alterando mis experimentos... Venga, llévatelo. Así será más manejable».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスは嘲笑する。{/n}「モン＝ケイが私を脅かすことができるなどと、本気で思っているのか？お前の肉体は強靭かもしれぬが、その精神は単純だ。ゆえに、お前の同胞と同じく、それを我が支配下におくことなど造作もないのだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスは嘲笑する。{/n}「モン＝ケイが私を脅かすことができるなどと、本気で思っているのか？お前の肉体は強靭かもしれぬが、その精神は単純だ。ゆえに、お前の同胞と同じく、それを我が支配下におくことなど造作もないのだよ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus dudak büküyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh'in tekinin beni korkutabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Bedenen güçlü olabilir ama bayağı bir zihne sahip. Dolayısıyla onu kontrol altında tutmak, diğer türdeşlerini kontrol altında tutmaktan zor değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus scoffs.{/n} "Do you truly think some mon-keigh can frighten me? His body may be strong, but his mind is simple, and therefore he is no more difficult to keep under control than any other member of your species."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus dudak büküyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh'in tekinin beni korkutabileceğini mi sanıyorsun sahiden? Bedenen güçlü olabilir ama bayağı bir zihne sahip. Dolayısıyla da onu kontrol altında tutmak, türünün diğer üyelerini kontrol altında tutmaktan daha zor değil."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
